mapper.select: SELECT MITUMORI.MITSUMORISHONO AS MITSUMORI_MITSUMORISHONO1 ,MITUMORI.HINMEI AS MITSUMORI_HINMEI2 ,MITUMORI.GOUKEI AS MITSUMORI_GOUKEI3 ,MITUMORI.TEISHUTSUBI AS MITSUMORI_TEISHUTSUBI4 ,TYUMONSYO.SHANAIKOUJIBANGOU AS CHUUBUNSHO_SHANAIKOUJIBANGOU5 ,TYUMONSYO.KYAKUSAKITANTOU AS CHUUBUNSHO_KYAKUSAKITANTOU6 ,SYAIN.SHAINMEI AS SHAIN_SHAINMEI7 ,KAISYA.KAISHAMEI AS KAISHA_KAISHAMEI8 FROM MITUMORI LEFT JOIN TYUMONSYO ON MITUMORI.MITSUMORISHONO = TYUMONSYO.MITSUMORISHONO LEFT JOIN KAISYA ON TYUMONSYO.KYAKUSAKIID = KAISYA.KAISHAID LEFT JOIN SYAIN ON MITUMORI.SAKUSEISHA = SYAIN.SHAINID WHERE 1 = 1 AND CASE WHEN #{CHUUMONNO} IS NULL OR #{CHUUMONNO} = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE TYUMONSYO.CHUUBUNSHONO = #{CHUUMONNO} END AND CASE WHEN #{TANTOUSHAID} IS NULL OR #{TANTOUSHAID} = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE TYUMONSYO.TANTOUSHAID = #{TANTOUSHAID} END AND CASE WHEN #{KYAKUSAKIID} IS NULL OR #{KYAKUSAKIID} = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE TYUMONSYO.KYAKUSAKIID = #{KYAKUSAKIID} END AND CASE WHEN #{SHUKKOJOUTAI} IS NULL OR #{SHUKKOJOUTAI} = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE TYUMONSYO.SHUTSUNYUUKOFURAGU = #{SHUKKOJOUTAI} END
